ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: There is no such thing as a REST client!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: If I look at a REST service like I do an SQL server then Eric s point makes more sense.  Who defines the meaning of an SQL database? It is open to meaming for
